ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: During it every wise decree is specified
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: On which all affairs are sorted out and decided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (We revealed it on the Night) wherein every matter is wisely determined
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On this night, every absolute command coming from Us becomes distinguishable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: During it are distributed all the works of wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therein (that night) is decreed every matter, Hakim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therein every wise affair is made distinct,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whereon every wise command is made clear
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that night every wise decree is specified
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Therein is decreed every affair of wisdom
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Every definitive matter is resolved on it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In the (Night) is made distinct every affair of wisdom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therein (that night) is decreed every matter of ordainments.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In it every wise matter is determined
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In it is distinguished every wise command.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: On that night is made distinct every precise matter -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:4] In it, that is to say, on the Night of Ordainment, or on the eve of the middle of Sha‘bān, every definitive matter, that has been fixed, with regard to the provisions and the terms of life and other things [decreed by God] for the entire year until that same night again [the following year], is distinguished, is decided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Whereupon) in this night of destiny (every wise command) every thing to take place from year to year (is made clear) is clarified,
